description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Use Oft Horizon's procedural technology to generate your unique island, control time, and alter the weather. Chat with others online, fade into the sounds of the ocean, and reflect on your own romantic portrait of the seaside.
description.short: Use Oft Horizon's procedural technology to generate your unique island, control time, and alter the weather. Chat with others online, fade into the sounds of the ocean, and reflect on your own romantic portrait of the seaside.
